text: Hermina Pipinić (1 May 1928 – 19 December 2020) was a Croatian actress. Her career began at the First Drama Theatre in Zagreb in 1948. She retired in 1997. She was born in Zagreb. Pipinić was known for her roles in Square of Violence, La steppa and Old Surehand. Pipinić died in Zagreb on 19 December 2020 at the age of 92.U 93. godini preminula mama Smogovaca: ‘Bilo mi je drago imati je za svekrvu u seriju‘ ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Actors from Zagreb
title: Hermina Pipinić
